title: Enhance Ability
content:
hance Ability

Enhance Ability can be acquired by the following classes: Bard, Cleric, Druid, Sorcerer Enhance Ability can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Bard, Cleric, Druid, Sorcerer

Enhance Ability Tips & Notes

Upcast: Add an additional target for each spell slot level above the 2nd. Only Ability Checks are affected (includes related skills and initiative). No Attack Rolls or Saving Throws. Best use is Eagle's Splendor for conversations.

Lvl 2 Spells Aid ♦ Arcane Lock ♦ Barkskin
